testcase.name: Check that if user tries to register with an email that already has been used to create an
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I hover over 'Hello, Sign in' button...................................passed And I click on 'Start here' link on homepage................................passed And I enter a random 'name'.................................................passed And I enter an "ciara105@xhanimatedm.com" address that's already in use in the 'Email' field.passed And I enter a random password in the 'Password' field.......................passed And I Re-enter the password in the `Re-enter password` field................passed And I click on 'Create you Amazon account' button on the Registration page..passed Then I verify "Email address already in use" is displayed for proving an email address that's already in use.passed
